function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Variability in the effectiveness of NPI combinations between intervention periods and regions","Impact":"Inconsistent impact on disease transmission control, leading to potential outbreaks in certain regions","Mitigation":"Standardize NPI implementation and monitor effectiveness across all regions","Technologies":"Data analytics for real-time monitoring of NPI effectiveness","People":"Population in regions with variable NPI effectiveness, public health authorities","Owner":"Public health authorities, government agencies"},{"Description":"Considerable uncertainty in transmission reduction estimates for NPIs","Impact":"Lack of confidence in the effectiveness of NPIs to control disease transmission, leading to potential misallocation of resources","Mitigation":"Conduct further research to reduce uncertainty and improve accuracy of transmission reduction estimates","Technologies":"Statistical modeling and simulation for refining transmission reduction estimates","People":"Public health authorities, researchers, policymakers","Owner":"Research institutions, public health authorities"},{"Description":"Heterogeneous transmission reduction during Curfew NPIs across regions","Impact":"Uneven control of disease transmission, leading to potential localized spread and resurgence of infections","Mitigation":"Tailor NPI strategies based on regional transmission patterns and implement targeted interventions","Technologies":"Geospatial analysis and mapping for identifying transmission hotspots","People":"Population in regions with heterogeneous transmission reduction, public health authorities","Owner":"Public health authorities, government agencies"}]}
